Package com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.windows

@Namespace("com.ibm.streams.javaprimitivesamples.windows") package com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.windows
Sample window-based SPL Java primitive operators and listeners. If an operator class is annotated with PrimitiveOperator then a corresponding primitive operator exists in the sample JavaOperators toolkit, located in $STREAMS_INSTALL/samples/spl/feature/JavaOperators. Sample operators in this Java package have the SPL namespace com.ibm.streams.javaprimitivesamples.windows defined by the Namespace annotation for this package.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DecimalSumAggregatorListener
    Sample window listener to demonstrate window aggregation on a decimal attribute.
    DecimalSumAggregatorListener.AggregateInfo
    Class for the per-partition state for the aggregate.
    TumblingSortOperator
    Sample ascending sort operator for a tumbling window.
